price: (Allah) Ya hõre ta a kansu a cikin dare bakwai da yini takwas, biye da jũna, sabõda haka, kana ganin mutãne a cikinta kwance. Kamar sũ ƙirãruwan dabĩno ne, waɗanda suka fãɗi.
arabic: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَبۡعَ لَيَالٖ وَثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومٗاۖ فَتَرَى ٱلۡقَوۡمَ فِيهَا صَرۡعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٍ خَاوِيَةٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: sakharahā ʿalayhim sabʿa layālin wathamāniyata ayyāmin ḥusūman fatarā al-qawma fīhā ṣarʿā ka-annahum aʿjāzu nakhlin khāwiyatin
